invocation: Prints week day of a 31 day in a current month.

invocation: Prints week day of a 31 day in a current month.
cmd: cal | awk -v date=31 'NR == 2 { split($0, header) } NR > 2 { for (i = 1; i <= NF; ++i) if ($i == date) { print header[NR == 3 ? i + 7 - NF : i]; exit } }'

invocation: Prints week day of a 31 day in a current month.
